eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils

Class EmbeddedClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.slipo.athenarc.triplegeo.utils.EmbeddedClassifier

  • public class EmbeddedClassifier
extends Object
    Assigns a category based on the textual similarity of a given description to a collection of tags characterizing the category. Correspondence between default (embedded) categories and tags is stored in a resource YML file (dictionary).
    Version:
    1.9
    Author:
    Kostas Patroumpas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Map<String,List<String>> categories 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedClassifier()
      Constructor of the embedded classification used in assigning default categories

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String assignCategory(String val)
      Given a textual description, search the dictionary for the most similar tag and assign the corresponding category.
      private void buildDefaultClassificationYML()
      Parses a resource YML file and populates the dictionary of tags and their correspondence to embedded categories.

      • buildDefaultClassificationYML

        private void buildDefaultClassificationYML()
                                    throws FileNotFoundException
        Parses a resource YML file and populates the dictionary of tags and their correspondence to embedded categories.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • assignCategory

        public String assignCategory(String val)
        Given a textual description, search the dictionary for the most similar tag and assign the corresponding category.
        Parameters:
        val - The textual description of a category (may be a single word, or a multi-word characterization)
        Returns:
        The category that has obtained the highest textual similarity score with the given description.
